metadata.title: CVE-2018-25103 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: There exists use-after-free vulnerabilities in lighttpd <= 1.4.50 requestparsing which might read from invalid pointers to memory used in the samerequest, not from other requests.

criterions.comment: lighttpd package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
